page.title: 02BO'NESS RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: The Recreation Centre is open 7 days a week. It is open from 9am-11pm. FACILITIES:Swimming pool, sports hall, sauna, solarium, a lesser hall with stage, adult games room (with snooker, pool, darts), 2 squash courts,TV room, conditioning room, cafeteria, viewing lounge, creche, photography dark room, hairdressing salon, garage, work shop, football, hockey and rugby pitches. CLUBS:Archery, badminton, basketball, harriers, indoor bowling, roller skating, hockey, indoor tennis, squash, swimming, subaqua, yoga, discos, gymnastics, weight training, football, rugby, keepfit, snooker, pool, darts, table tennis, playgroup, photography, majorettes, radio and radio controlled racing cars. Other activities:Film shows, dinghy & canoe construction, slimming club, knitting club and volleyball.
